work.title: Developer Intern
work.description: Designed BI solution applets and codes - During the internship, I developed email automation processing, SAP downloading tools for the team. Also, we designed Oracle DB queries and maintained the database together.

work.title: Web Developer Intern
work.description: Enhanced the webpage performance / Designed and coded the customer email template. Except being codeblooded, I am also an aviation fan. Interned at the United Nation's aviation department was really a precious experience. I maintained the code of ICAO's blog site, implement CDN and other performance enhancing actions. Also I participated the daily newsletter email template coding.

work.title: Developer Intern
work.description: Maintained the code of campus management system. Although I didn't study at McGill, I am also a McGill Alumni :). During this internship, I maintained the Java code of their campus system. I fixed the bug in the PhD's offer letter, the parking bill calculation, also the logic of giving others access to their transcripts.
